评论详情: I usually wear a large, but I ordered an XL because I was unsure. It fits me perfectly! If you have a curvier body type, it may feel a bit snug, but I personally like how the material is not thin at all. However, if you are expecting a loose and baggy hood, this may not be the right product for you. The stitching in some areas is a little wonky but this is better than I expected!
This was a gift. She looked cute when she tried it on
This was exactly what I was looking for! It’s soooo comfy and soft. A little oversized which is what I wanted and it’s absolutely adorable!

评论概述: There is nothing oversized about this hoodie
评论详情: It arrived and was a completely different pattern. It was black and white stiped, but the ears were narrow and sad not whimsical amd fun. The whole fit was different, basically just a normal dad hoodie fit. Ends at the top of your hips with normal,tightish fitting sleeves and sad long thin ears tacked on top. If it was returnable it would have been returned.

评论概述: No cause WHY IS IT SO PERFECT AND ADORABLE
评论详情: Literally perfect, cutest zip up i own, im 5’4-5’5 and the bunny ears almost go past my bum in the back, which is nice cause they’re actually noticeable and cute! The sleeves are slim on ur wrist and then puffy for ur arms, very nice Im almost E cup chest size, zips perfectly fine and looks cute!
